title: Aku No Akuma
alternative_title: Aku no Akuma; The Demon of Evil; 悪の悪魔
status: Aku no Akuma; The Demon of Evil; 悪の悪魔
description:
Description :
        For 100 billion years shinjins (demigod)
fighting against akujins (demons),

Shinjins believe for akujins as evil race.
Therefore shinjins decided to execute them all,

But for 100 billion years always
akujins manage to protect
their planet and their self,

Until now descendant of
shinjins starting to attacked
again on akujins.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Chapter 1:  A Young Akujin Has Been Born
